page.title: 01Countryside E.of Dalbeattie
page.content: The area is bounded by hills to he North and East, forest to he west ad a valley runs south towards the shore. Most of the land is ued for the rough grazing of sheep, although there is a small amount of arable land in the valley. The forest takes up 3 km at present this is run by the forstry commission. Most of the people who live here, around 20 either work on farms or are still at school. Some people, travel from Dalbeattie to ork at a regional rubbish dump. This dump takes up around 1/4 of km this is built on an area of bog locally known as the mass.
